As nobody answered, follow the solution for the fking problem:
Well.. I checked the 2nd DVD, and I found the files that was not in th 1st DVD.
So, I used the MagicISO to put all the files of the DVD2, transfering to the DVD1. After this, I saved the job.
Thats all. It worked. Easy and simply.
Thanks.
